FuncDef: When the router is in an overload state, SPB the B-VPLS is used only if there is no other SPB B-VPLS to reach the destination. This command configures the IGP upon boot up in the overload state until one of the following events occur:

ParaDef.Info: The time, in seconds, that this router must operate in overload state. Values-60 to 1800. ParamDefault: Default- Infinity (overload state maintained indefinitely)
